summary: Another gambling movie from Wong Jing, this time he combines the fun of kung fu and mahjong.
cast: Wah Yuen|Qiu Yuen|Roger Kwok|Theresa Fu|Jing Wong|Yat Tung Wong|Jade Leung|Kai-Man Tin|Tze-Chung Lam|Yuen-San Choi|Lung Dai|Jerry Lamb|Eddie Li|Siu-Ming Lui|Gary Wing-Lun Mak|Koo Yuen|Kam Pong Chow
title: Jeuk sing
